children.text: meghaiḥ meduram ambaram vana-bhuvaḥ śyāmāḥ tamāla-drumaiḥ
naktam bhīruḥ ayam tvam eva tat imam rādhe gṛham prāpaya /
jānīte jayadevaḥ eva śaraṇaḥ ślāghyaḥ durūha-drute /
spardhī kaḥ api na viśrutaḥ śrutidharaḥ dhoyī kavi-kṣmāpatiḥ //
vedān uddharate jagat nivahate bhūgolam udbibhrate
daityam dārayate balim chalayate kṣatra-kṣayam kurvate /
paulastyam jayate halam kalayate kāruṇyam ātanvate
mlecchān mūrcchayate daśa-ākṛti-kṛte kṛṣṇāya tubhyam namaḥ //
valat-bādhām rādhām sarasam idam ūce sahacarī //
nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //
nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //
nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //
nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //
nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //
nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //
nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //
nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //
nīyante pathikaiḥ katham katham api dhyāna-avadhāna-kṣaṇa-
murārim ārāt upadarśayantī asau sakhī samakṣam punaḥ āha rādhikām //
hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //
hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //
hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //
kāpi kapola-tale militā lapitum kimapi śruti-mūle /
cāru cucumba nitambavatī dayitam pulakaiḥ anukūle //
hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //
hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //
hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //
śliṣyati kāmapi cumbati kāmapi kāmapi ramayati rāmām /
hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //
hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //
śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi mūrtimān iva madhau mugdhaḥ hariḥ krīḍati //
unmīlanti kuhūḥ kuhūḥ iti kala-uttālāḥ pikānām giraḥ //
mukhara-śikhare līnā dīnā api uvāca rahaḥ sakhīm //
rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //
rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //
rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //
rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //
rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //
rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //
mām api kimapi taraṅgat-anaṅga-dṛśā manasā ramayantam //
rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //
rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //
gaṇayati guṇa-grāmam bhāmam bhramāt api na īhate
vahati ca parītoṣam doṣam vimuñcati dūrataḥ /
yuvatiṣu valat-tṛṣṇe kṛṣṇe vihāriṇi mām vinā
punaḥ api manaḥ vāmam kāmam karoti karomi kim //
nibhṛta-nikuñja-gṛham gatayā niśi rahasi nilīya vasantam /
kisalaya-śayana-niveśitayā ciram urasi mama eva śayānam /
prasūtiḥ cūtānām sakhi śikhariṇī iyam sukhayati //
itaḥ tataḥ tām anusṛtya rādhikām anaṅga-bāṇa-vraṇa-khinna-mānasaḥ /
mām iyam calitā vilokya vṛtam vadhū-nicayena /
harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //
kim kariṣyati kim vadiṣyati sā ciram viraheṇa /
kim dhanena janena kim mama jīvitena gṛheṇa //
harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //
śoṇa-padmam iva upari bhramatā ākulam bhramareṇa //
harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //
tām aham hṛdi saṃgatām aniśam bhṛśam ramayāmi /
kim vane anusarāmi tām iha kim vṛthā vilapāmi //
harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //
tanvi khinnam asūyayā hṛdayam tava ākalayāmi /
tat na vedmi kutaḥ gatā asi na tena te anunayāmi //
harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //
dṛśyase purataḥ gata-āgatam eva me vidadhāsi /
kim purā iva sasaṃbhramaṃ parirambhaṇam na dadāsi //
harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //
kṣamyatām aparam kadāpi tava īdṛśam na karomi /
dehi sundari darśanam mama manmathena dunomi //
harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //
harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //
malayaja-rajaḥ na idam bhasma prihāra-hite mayi
prahara na hara-bhrāntyā anaṅga krudhā kim u dhāvasi //
pāṇau mā kuru cūta-sāyakam amum mā cāpam āropaya
śreṇī-jarjaritam manāk api manaḥ na adya api saṃdhukṣate //
śyāma-ātmā kuṭilaḥ karotu kabarī-bhāraḥ api māra-udyamam /
moham tāvat ayam ca tanvi tanutām bimba-adharaḥ rāgavān
sat-vṛtta-stana-maṇḍalaḥ tava katham prāṇaiḥ mama krīḍati //
tāni sparśa-sukhāni te ca taralāḥ snigdhāḥ dṛśoḥ vibhramāḥ
tat-vaktra-ambuja-saurabham saḥ ca sudhā-syandī girām vakrimā /
sā bimba-adhara-mādhurī iti viṣaya-āsaṅge api cet mānasam
tasyām lagna-samādhi hanta viraha-vyādhiḥ katham vardhate //
nindati candanam indukaraṇam anu vindati khedam adhīram /
mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //
mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //
vratam iva tava parirambha-sukhāya karoti kusuma-śayanīyam //
mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //
mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //
praṇamati makaram adhaḥ vinidhāya kare ca śaram nava-cūtam //
mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //
prati-padam idam api nigadati mādhava tava caraṇe patitā aham /
tvayi vimukhe mayi sapadi sudhā-nidhiḥ api tanute tanu-dāham //
mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //
dhyāna-layena puraḥ parikalpya bhavantam atīva durāpam /
vilapati hasati viṣīdati roditi cañcati muñcati tāpam //
mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //
śrījayadeva-bhaṇitam idam adhikam yadi manasā naṭanīyam /
mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //
sā api tvat-viraheṇa hanta hariṇīrūpāyate hā katham
hariḥ iti hariḥ iti japati sakāmam /
sā romāñcati sītkaroti vilapati utkampate tāmyati
dhyāyati udbhramati pramīlati patati udyāti mūrcchati api /
etāvati atanu-jvare vara-tanuḥ jīvet na kim te rasāt
svaḥ-vaidya-pratima prasīdasi yadi tyaktaḥ anyathā na antakaḥ //
vimukta-bādhām kuruṣe na rādhām upendra vajrāt api dāruṇaḥ asi //
kiṃtu klānti-vaśena śītala-tanum tvām ekam eva priyam
dhyāyantī rahasi sthitā katham api kṣīṇā kṣaṇam prāṇiti //
kṣaṇam api virahaḥ purā na sehe
aham iha nivasāmi yāhi rādhām anunaya mat-vacanena ca ānayethāḥ /
iti madhuripuṇā sakhī niyuktā svayam idam etya punaḥ jagāda rādhām //
manasi valita-virahe niśi niśi rujam upayāti //
luṭhati dharaṇi-śayane bahu vilapati tava nāma //
pūrvam yatra samam tvayā ratipateḥ āsāditāḥ siddhayaḥ
dhyāyan tvām aniśam japan api tava eva ālāpa-mantra-āvalīm
na kuru nitambini gamana-vilambanam anusara tam hṛdaya-īśam //
bahu manute nanu te tanu-saṃgata-pavana-calitam api reṇum //
racayati śayanam sacakita-nayanam paśyati tava panthānam //
mukharam adhīram tyaja mañjīram ripum iva keli-sulolam /
cala sakhi kuñjam satimira-puñjam śīlaya nīla-nicolam //
urasi murāreḥ upahita-hāre ghane iva tarala-balāke /
taḍit iva pīte rati-viparīte rājasi sukṛta-vipāke //
hariḥ abhimānī rajaniḥ idānīm iyam api yāti virāmam /
kuru mama vacanam satvara-racanam pūraya madhuripu-kāmam //
vikirati muhuḥ śvāsān āśāḥ puraḥ muhuḥ īkṣate
praviśati muhuḥ kuñjam guñjan muhuḥ bahu tāmyati /
racayati muhuḥ śayyām paryākulam muhuḥ īkṣate
tvat-vāmyena samam samagram adhunā tigmāṃśuḥ astam gataḥ
govindasya manorathena ca samam prāptam tamaḥ sāndratām /
tat mugdhe viphalam vialambanam asau ramyaḥ abhisāra-kṣaṇaḥ //
āśleṣāt anu cumbanāt anu nakha-ullekhāt anu svāntaja-
prodbodhāt anu saṃbhramāt anu rata-ārambhāt anu prītayoḥ /
anya-artham gatayoḥ bhramāt militayoḥ saṃbhāṣaṇaiḥ jānatoḥ
dampatyoḥ iha kaḥ na kaḥ na tamasi vrīḍā-vimiśraḥ rasaḥ //
pratitaru muhuḥ sthitvā mandam padāni vitanvatīm /
katham api rahaḥ prāptām aṅgaiḥ anaṅga-taraṅgibhiḥ
sumukhi subhagaḥ paśyan saḥ tvām upaitu kṛta-arthatām //
atha tām gantum aśaktām ciram anuraktām latā-gṛhe dṛṣṭvā /
aṅgeṣu ābharaṇam karoti bahuśaḥ patre api saṃcāriṇi
prāptam tvām pariśaṅkate vitanute śayyām ciram dhyāyati /
vyāsaktā api vinā tvayā vara-tanuḥ naiṣā niśām neṣyati //
prasarati śaśa-dhara-bimbe vihita-vilambe ca mādhave vidhurā /
kathita-samaye api hariḥ ahaha na yayau vanam /
mama viphalam idam amala-rūpam api yauvanam //
yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //
yat anugamanāya niśi gahanam api śīlitam /
yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //
yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //
yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //
yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //
srak api hṛdi hanti mām ativiṣama-śilayā //
yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //
smarati madhusūdanaḥ mām api na cetasā //
yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //
yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //
tat kim kāmapi kāminīm abhisṛtaḥ kim vā kalā-kelibhiḥ
baddhaḥ bandhubhiḥ andhakāriṇi vana-upānte kim u bhrāmyati /
kāntaḥ klānta-manāḥ manāk api pathi prasthātum eva akṣamaḥ
atha āgatām mādhavam antareṇa sakhīm iyam vīkṣya viṣāda-mūkām /
viśaṅkamānā ramitam kayāpi janārdanam dṛṣṭavat etat āha //
vidhuḥ atīva tanoti manobhuvaḥ sahṛdaye hṛdaye madana-vyathām //
mṛgamada-tilakam likhati sapulakam mṛgam iva rajanī-kare //
kim aphalam avasam ciram iha virasam vada sakhi viṭapa-udare //
na āyātaḥ sakhi nirdayaḥ yadi śaṭhaḥ tvam dūti kim dūyase
svacchandam bahu-vallabhaḥ saḥ ramate kim tatra te dūṣaṇam /
paśya adya priya-saṃgamāya dayitasya ākṛṣyamāṇam guṇaiḥ
utkaṇṭha-ārti-bharāt iva sphuṭat idam cetaḥ svayam yāsyāmi //
ripuḥ iva sakhī-saṃvāsaḥ ayam śikhī iva hima-anilaḥ
viṣam iva sudhā-raśmiḥ yasmin dunoti manaḥ-gate /
hṛdayam adaye tasmin evam punaḥ valate balāt
prāṇān gṛhāṇa na gṛham punaḥ āśrayiṣye /
atha katham api yāminīm vinīya smara-śara-jarjaritā api sā prabhāte /
anunaya-vacanam vadantam agre praṇatam api priyam āha sābhyasūyam //
vahati nayanam anurāgam iva sphuṭam udita-rasa-abhiniveśam //
harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam
tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //
daśana-vasanam aruṇam tava kṛṣṇa tanoti tanoḥ anurūpam //
harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam
tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //
harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam
tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //
harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam
tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //
daśana-padam bhavat-adhara-gatam mama janayati cetasi khedam /
kathayati katham adhunā api mayā saha tava vapuḥ etat abhedam //
harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam
tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //
bahiḥ iva malinataram tava kṛṣṇa manaḥ api bhaviṣyati nūnam /
katham atha vañcayase janam anugatam asamaśara-jvara-dūnam //
harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam
tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //
bhramati bhavān abalā-kavalāya vaneṣu kim atra vicitram /
harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam
tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //
śṛṇuta sudhā-madhuram vibudhāḥ vibudha-ālayataḥ api durāpam //
harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam
tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //
tava idam paśyantyāḥ prasarat anurāgam bahiḥ iva
tvat-ālokaḥ śokāt api kim api lajjām janayati //
mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //
mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //
kati na kathitam idam anupadam aciram /
mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //
mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //
mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //
mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //
mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //
mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //
snigdhe yat paruṣā asi yat praṇamati stabdhā asi yat rāgiṇi
dveṣa-sthā asi yat unmukhe vimukhatām yātā asi tasmin priye /
yuktam tat viparīta-kāriṇi tava śrīkhaṇḍa-carcā viṣam
śītāṃśuḥ tapanaḥ himam hutavahaḥ krīḍā-mudaḥ yātanāḥ //
priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam
satyam eva asi yadi sudati mayi kopinī
priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam
tvam asi mama bhūṣaṇam tvam asi mama jīvanam
bhavatu bhavatī iha mayi satatam anurodhinī
priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam
priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam
priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam
priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam
priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam
priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam
parihara kṛta-ātaṅke śaṅkām tvayā satatam ghana-
viśati vitanoḥ anyaḥ dhanyaḥ na kaḥ api mama-antaram
caṇḍi tvam eva mudam añca na pañcabāṇa-
vyathayati vṛthā maunam tanvi prapañcaya pañcamam
sumukhi vimukhī-bhāvam tāvat vimuñca na muñca mām
svayam atiśaya-snigdhaḥ mugdhe priyaḥ aham upasthitaḥ //
prāyaḥ tvat-mukha-sevayā vijayate viśvam saḥ puṣpāyudhaḥ //
preraṇam iva karabha-ūru karoti gatim pratimuñca vilambam //
adhigatam akhila-sakhībhiḥ idam tava vapuḥ api rati-raṇa-sajjam /
cala valaya-kvaṇitaiḥ avabodhaya harim api nijagati-śīlam //
sā mām drakṣyati vakṣyati smara-kathām prati-aṅgam āliṅganaiḥ
prītim yāsyati raṃsyate sakhi samāgatya iti cintā-ākulaḥ /
saḥ tvām paśyati vepate pulakayati ānandati svidyati
tvām cittena ciram vahan ayam atiśrāntaḥ bhṛśam tāpitaḥ
asya aṅgam tat alaṃkuru kṣaṇam iha bhrū-kṣepa-lakṣmī-lava-
krīte dāse iva upasevita-pada-ambhoje kutaḥ sambhramaḥ //
hāram amalatara-tāram urasi dadhatam parirabhya vidūram /
praṇamata hṛdi suciram vinidhāya harim sukṛta-udaya-sāram //
salajjā lajjā api vyagamat iva dūram mṛga-dṛśaḥ //
kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //
kara-kamalena karomi caraṇamaham āgamitā asi vidūram /
kṣaṇam upakuru śayana-upari mām iva nūpuram anugata-śūram //
kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //
viraham iva apanayāmi payodhara-rodhakam urasi dukūlam //
kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //
kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //
adhara-sudhā-rasam upanaya bhāvini jīvaya mṛtam iva dāsam /
kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //
śruti-yugale pika-ruta-vikale mama śamaya cirāt avasādam //
kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //
mām ativiphala-ruṣā vikalīkṛtam avalokitum adhunā idam /
mīlita-lajjitam iva nayanam tava virama visṛja rati-khedam //
kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //
kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //
prāyam kānta-jayāya kiṃcit upari prārambhi yat-sambhramāt /
vakṣaḥ mīlitam akṣi pauruṣa-rasaḥ strīṇām kutaḥ sidhyati //
bhramara-cayam racayantam upari ruciram suciram mama saṃmukhe /
jita-kamale vimale parikarmaya narma-janakam alakam mukhe //
mama rucire cikure kuru mānada mānasaja-dhvaja-cāmare /
śrījayadeva-vacasi rucire hṛdayam sadayam kuru maṇḍane /
racaya kucayoḥ patram citram kuruṣva kapolayoḥ
ghaṭaya jaghane kāñcīm añca srajā kabarī-bharam /
kalaya valaya-śreṇīm pāṇau pade kuru nūpurau
iti nigaditaḥ prītaḥ pītāmbaraḥ api tathā akarot //
yat gāndharva-kalāsu kauśalam anudhyānam ca yat vaiṣṇavam
yat śṛṅgāra-viveka-tattvam api yat kāvyeṣu līlāyitam /
